release().details: User (sender) can release unlocked tokens by calling this function. This function will release locked tokens from multiple lock phases that meets unlock requirements Reverts in the following cases: - No tokens to be withdrawn including:     + All lock phases are already released     + Do not meet next unlock requirements - Amount of tokens that this smart contract holds is insufficient. In this case, users should contact the owner of the token.

initialize(address,address,address,uint3.notice: Register a new lock for a user Reverts in the following cases: - Duplicated lock id for a user. - `lockDurations` and `releaseAmounts` length don't match.
